definition[0]: if a sound or picture is fuzzy, it is unclear
example[0]: Some of the photos were so fuzzy it was hard to tell who was who.
example[1]: There’s a fuzzy line between parents’ and schools’ responsibilities.
definition[2]: covered with soft short hair or fur
example[2]: I stroked the kitten’s fuzzy back.
definition[3]: fuzzy hair is very curly and sticks straight up
